Package taskawaii.components

package taskawaii.components
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ChangeNameFrame
    This class creates a ChangeNameDialogue to edit user name.
    CompletedTaskListItem
    This is the JPanel that holds each task in the CompletedTasksBar.
    CompletedTasksBar
    This is the CompletedTasksBar seen in the eastPanel of the HomePage.
    HintTextArea
    This is a custom JTextArea that displays a hint for users.
    HintTextField
    This is a custom JTextField that displays a hint for users.
    HomePage
    This is the main HomePage the user will see after they have successfully entered the required user details.
    PendingTaskListItem
    This is the JPanel that holds each task in the PendingTasksBar.
    PendingTasksBar
    This is the PendingTasksBar seen in the eastPanel of the HomePage.
    StartPage
    This is the StartPage the user sees if there is no userdata.ser yet.
    TaskEditorPanel
    This is the JPanel that enables users to edit their tasks.
    TaskEditorPanelBody
    This is the JPanel that holds the content HintTextArea and relevant actions.
